extendedInfo.description: Ace your Transport Canada (TC) PSTAR pre-solo written test and Private Pilot and/or Recreational Pilot theory exams!This GroundSchool - Canada Pilot PSTAR/Private Pilot/Recreational pilot app is a comprehensive learning tool to help you learn the material that you will be asked on the actual exam papers. The questions are very similar to those that you will see on your Private Pilot and/or Recreational Pilot exams, and EXACTLY like those as you will likely see on the PSTAR.The entire test bank consists of around 1000 representative questions. All feature full explanations, many of which are illustrated. Best of all, you can be sure that the questions are current and representative, as not only do we have a professional and experienced team of CFI and Professional Pilot authors and editors overseeing our test prep content, but also updates are integrated and free. Thatâs right; updates are built-into the app such that you can with one click get access to the latest and greatest sample questions that our editors have made available.We have been providing test preparation for Transport Canada theory exams since 1997 through our CanadaPilot.com website. This app brings the same reliable and representative questions and detailed explanations to your iOS device while maintaining the high level of usability that youâve come to expect from our applications. This app is 100% all that you need to study to prepare for your Transport Canada PSTAR, Recreational Pilot, and/or Private Pilot theory exams.The app includes:- Hundreds of representative questions- Unlimited study and test practice- Several learning and study modes- All the figures that you need to reference are included- Detailed explanations for each question- Free lifetime built-in updatesWe invite you to be one of the many pilots flying around Canada and the world at large who have used our materials as a stepping stone to aviation success!

reviews.title: Very good PPL Study App.
reviews.comment: I own the PC version of this App and love both.  the Android version is not as pretty but works very well.

reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.comment: App is so-so. However, there are free tests online and great books that are laid out better. Had an issue with the Android app and enjoyed one of the worst customer service experiences from \'Marty\'. Final recommendation is to save your money with the duplication of material this app gives you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashy
reviews.comment: When it works it\'s ok. Unfortunately most of the time it crashes on start.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: MUST USE PROGRAM
reviews.comment: This program is amazing. I aced my PSTAR with help from this app. I cant wait to start using it to study for my PPL
reviews.author: A Google User
